sentences.sContent: An acute outbreak of poliomyelitis is occurring in the Republic of Congo, with 120 cases of acute flaccid paralysis and 58 deaths.
sentences.sContent_eng: An acute outbreak of poliomyelitis is occurring in the Republic of Congo, with 120 cases of acute flaccid paralysis and 58 deaths.
sentences.sCn: 刚果共和国发生急性脊髓灰质炎疫情，已发生120例弛缓性麻痹病例和58例死亡。

synos.tran: [内科]脊髓灰质炎；[医]小儿麻痹症

trans.tranCn: [内科] 脊髓灰质炎；[医] 小儿麻痹症
